mapper.insert: INSERT INTO store(store_category_id, member_id, store_name, store_phone, store_introduce) VALUES (#{storeCategoryId}, #{memberId}, #{storeName}, #{storePhone}, #{storeIntroduce})
mapper.select: SELECT store.store_id, store.store_name, store.store_phone, store.store_introduce, member.member_name, store_category.store_category_name FROM store inner join store_category on store.store_category_id = store_category.store_category_id inner join member on store.member_id = member.member_id WHERE store.store_id = #{storeId}
